original_text: There were six steps up to the throne. The back of the throne was a round shape at the top. On both sides of the seat there were places for the king to put his arms. An image of a lion stood on each side of the throne.
korean_text: 그 보좌에는 여섯 층계가 있고 보좌 뒤에 둥근 머리가 있고 앉는 자리 양쪽에는 팔걸이가 있고 팔걸이 곁에는 사자가 하나씩 서 있으며

sentences.original_text: There were six steps up to the throne
The back of the throne was a round shape at the top
On both sides of the seat there were places for the king to put his arms
sentences.korean_translation: 좌석 양쪽에는 왕이 팔을 올려놓을 곳이 있었다

sentences.original_text: An image of a lion stood on each side of the throne
sentences.korean_translation: 사자의 형상이 왕위의 양쪽에 서 있었다
